In England, in the seven days to 06 December, there were 287,525 new confirmed cases (508.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 29 November, there were 255,560 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 13% (31,965 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 11 December is 9,138,773 (16,160.5 cases per 100,000 population).
